name: Build & Deploy via Lambda Agent

on:
  push:
    branches: [ "main" ]

env:
  AWS_REGION: us-east-1  # change if you deploy in another region

jobs:
  build-and-push:
    name: Build & Push Image to ECR
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Configure AWS credentials
        uses: aws-actions/configure-aws-credentials@v2
        with:
          aws-access-key-id: ${{ secrets.AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID }}
          aws-secret-access-key: ${{ secrets.AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY }}
          aws-region: ${{ env.AWS_REGION }}

      - name: Login to Amazon ECR
        uses: aws-actions/amazon-ecr-login@v2

      - name: Build & Push Docker image
        env:
          ECR_REPO_URI: ${{ secrets.ECR_REPO_URI }}
          IMAGE_TAG: ${{ github.sha }}
        run: |
          set -euo pipefail
          echo "Building $ECR_REPO_URI:$IMAGE_TAG"
          docker build -t $ECR_REPO_URI:$IMAGE_TAG .
          docker push $ECR_REPO_URI:$IMAGE_TAG
          echo "Pushed $ECR_REPO_URI:$IMAGE_TAG"

  deploy:
    name: Human Approval â†’ Deploy via Lambda
    needs: build-and-push
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    environment: production   # <-- This triggers the manual approval gate
    steps:
      - name: Deploy via Lambda (deployToECS)
        env:
          AGENT_URL_DEPLOY: ${{ secrets.AGENT_URL_DEPLOY }}
          AGENT_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.AGENT_TOKEN }}
          COMMIT_SHA: ${{ github.sha }}
        run: |
          set -euo pipefail
          echo "Deploying commit: $COMMIT_SHA"
          curl -sS -v --fail-with-body \
            -X POST \
            -H "Authorization: Bearer ${AGENT_TOKEN}" \
            -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
            -d "{\"commit\": \"${COMMIT_SHA}\"}" \
            "${AGENT_URL_DEPLOY}"
          echo "Deployment request sent."
